title: Cozy Second-Story Apt on Acreage/Meadows
map_address: 6856 NE W. Port Madison Road near Highway 305
posting_body: Cozy, second-story apartment on acreage among trees/meadows.
More photos and and walkthrough video and full info on Zillow (Simply pull up   bit#ly/biapartment   replace '#' with '.' in your browser).
Hardwood floors and electric heat throughout.
The living room has a propane fireplace, vaulted ceiling, coat closet, and overhead storage cubby.
The master bedroom has a 40 sq.ft.
walk-in closet with organizer shelving; other bedroom has a half closet.
The kitchen has tons of cabinet storage and propane stovetop (gas heat + stove are sweet during our occasional island power outages!)
Blackout window shades in bedrooms and living room.
Bath has tile floors and laundry.
The deck is perfect for evening stargazing over tea or wine.
Off-street parking for one vehicle, no other garage or storage space.
1 acre compound, not fenced, shared with other tenants incl.
North end of island, Seabold/West Port Madison -- super close to 305 for 91/390 bus routes and roundabout next year (construction/tree removal in future).
Six miles to Bainbridge ferry terminal or to Poulsbo.
One mile walk east to West Port Madison Nature Preserve; half mile walk to the west is Agate Passage Preserve with serene mountain/sound views.
PPPPPLEASE NOTE: Due to busy summer scheduling, I'm providing the walkthrough video as well as photos and written description.
APPLICANTS VIA ZILLOW have top priority for consideration, Zoom interview, and then property tour.
